document_title: Http debug commands in FortiMail exposes users credentials to admins

note.text: FortiMail's "diag debug application httpd" set of commands can be used to capture the credentials entered in the admin WebGui and the webmail login page forms. The debug commands can be executed by super_admin users and admin users.
note.title: Description

note.text: FortiMail 5.0.3 to 5.2.3. Previous versions are not affected.
note.title: Affected Products

note.text: Upgrade to 5.2.4.There is currently no workaround to disable the debug command in 5.1 and 5.0.
note.title: Solutions

vulnerability.title: Http debug commands in FortiMail exposes users credentials to admins
